Description.Text: Decameron Los Delfines is a modern 3-star resort offering comfortable accommodation in north San Andres. It boasts a restaurant, poolside bar, two swimming pools and an excellent location on the beach. Punta Hansa is an exclusive commercial centre situated on the island's north coast. It offers a beautiful sandy beach and a vibrant nightlife. Nearby places of interest include the Royal Decameron Aquarium, Johnny Cay and San Luis Beach. The hotel occupies a modern 3-storey building. Facilities include a natural swimming pool and freshwater swimming pool. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with a vibrant colour scheme. They feature beach or partial ocean views. Amenities include a flat-screen cable TV, air-conditioning, mini-bar and mini-fridge. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The El Muelle restaurant offers a-la-carte lunch and dinners in a seafront setting. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the poolside bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. ***All Travco guests can enjoy hotel facilities in all Decameron properties on San Andres as well as gain free entry to Club de Playa Rocky Cay subject to availability and prior reservation.***
